attitude.title: Attitude
attitude.description: Attitude around the principal aircraft axes

items.title: Roll angle
items.description: Roll angle, in 1/10th of degrees

items.title: Pitch angle
items.description: Pitch angle, in 1/10th of degrees

items.title: Yaw angle
items.description: Yaw angle, in 1/10th of degrees

batteryInfo.title: Battery information
batteryInfo.description: Information about the on-board battery of the UAV, if applicable

items.title: Battery voltage
items.description: The voltage of the battery, in 1/10th of volts

items.title: State of charge (%)
items.description: Percentage indicator of the state of charge of the battery (100% = full, 0% = empty, -1 = unknown)

items.title: Charging
items.description: Whether the battery is charging

beaconBasicProperties.title: Beacon basic properties
beaconBasicProperties.description: Basic information of a single beacon that is unlikely to change over time

name.title: Name
name.description: The human-readable name of the beacon, shown on the UI

beaconIdList.title: Beacon IDs
beaconIdList.description: IDs of the beacons that the message refers to

beaconStatusInfo.title: Beacon status info
beaconStatusInfo.description: Status information of a single beacon

active.title: Is active
active.description: Whether the beacon is currently active (operational). May be omitted for passive beacons or points of interest.

heading.title: Heading
heading.description: The heading of the beacon in the local tangent plane, in 1/10th of degrees, if known

timestamp.title: Last updated at
timestamp.description: Timestamp that denotes when the status of the beacon was updated the last time

channelId.title: Channel ID
channelId.description: Identifier of a single channel of a single device on a UAV

channelOperation.title: Operation
channelOperation.description: Operation that can be performed on a channel

clockIdList.title: Clock IDs
clockIdList.description: IDs of the clocks that the message refers to

commandExecutionStatus.title: Command execution status
commandExecutionStatus.description: Execution status of a command executed on a UAV

commandResponse.title: Command response
commandResponse.description: Response given by a UAV to a command request

connectionIdList.title: Connection IDs
connectionIdList.description: IDs of the connections that the message refers to

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: Identifier of a single device on a UAV

deviceTreeNode.title: Device tree node
deviceTreeNode.description: A single device tree node representing a UAV, a device or a channel

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Unit in which the value of a numeric channel is expressed

deviceTreeNodeType.title: Type
deviceTreeNodeType.description: Type of a device tree node

deviceTreePath.title: Device tree path
deviceTreePath.description: An absolute device path that uniquely identifies a UAV, a device on a UAV or a channel of a device on a UAV

deviceTreePathList.title: Device tree paths
deviceTreePathList.description: Paths of the device tree entries that the message refers to

dockIdList.title: Dock IDs
dockIdList.description: IDs of the docking stations that the message refers to

dockStatusInfo.title: Docking station status info
dockStatusInfo.description: Status information of a single docking station

timestamp.title: Last updated at
timestamp.description: Timestamp that denotes when the status of the docking station was updated the last time

droneShowConfiguration.title: Drone show configuration
droneShowConfiguration.description: Full configuration of a drone show

authorized.description: Whether the server has received authorization from a human operator to start the show

time.description: Timestamp when the drone show should start

uavIds.description: Array containing the IDs of the UAVs that should be started automatically

mapping.description: Mapping of show-specific indices to the corresponding UAV IDs, if known. Not mandatory.

droneLightsConfiguration.title: Drone lights configuration
droneLightsConfiguration.description: Full configuration of the behaviour of the LED lights on a drone during a drone show

color.description: Color of the light effect in RGB notations. Values in the array must be between 0 and 255, inclusive.

errorCodeList.title: List of errors
errorCodeList.description: List of currently active error codes for a single UAV

extensionIdList.title: Extension IDs
extensionIdList.description: IDs of the extensions that the message refers to

items.title: Latitude
items.description: Latitude, in 1e-7 degrees

items.title: Longitude
items.description: Longitude, in 1e-7 degrees

items.title: AMSL
items.description: Altitude above mean sea level, in millimeters

items.title: AHL
items.description: Altitude above home level, in millimeters

items.title: AGL
items.description: Altitude above ground level, in millimeters

gpsFix.title: GPS fix
gpsFix.description: Basic information about the GPS fix

license.title: License
license.description: A license object that is activated on the server

licenseFeature.title: License feature
licenseFeature.description: An optional feature that is enabled by a license

licenseRestriction.title: License restrictions
licenseRestriction.description: Restrictions imposed on the functionality of the server by a license

logMessage.title: Log message
logMessage.description: A single log message sent from the server to the client

items.title: North
items.description: North component, in nanoteslas

items.title: East
items.description: East component, in nanoteslas

items.title: Down
items.description: Down component, in nanoteslas

objectIdList.title: Object IDs
objectIdList.description: IDs of the objects that the message refers to

objectType.title: Object type
objectType.description: Type of an object tracked by the server

objectTypeFilter.title: Object types
objectTypeFilter.description: Types of objects that the user is interested in

preflightCheckInfo.title: UAV preflight check info
preflightCheckInfo.description: Preflight check information of a single UAV

preflightCheckItem.title: A single item in a preflight checklist

label.title: Label of the preflight checklist item

message.title: Detailed message for the preflight checklist item

preflightCheckResult.title: Preflight check result
preflightCheckResult.description: Result of the preflight check or a single item in a preflight checklist

positionXYZ.title: Position (XYZ)
positionXYZ.description: Position in a local right-handed XYZ coordinate system

items.title: X component
items.description: X component of the vector, in mm

items.title: Y component
items.description: Y component of the vector, in mm

items.title: Z component
items.description: Z component of the vector, in mm

progress.title: Progress information
progress.description: Progress of some operation being executed on a UAV

receiptIdList.title: Receipt IDs
receiptIdList.description: IDs of the receipts that the message refers to

transportOptions.title: Transport options
transportOptions.description: Additional preferences about how the message should be delivered to UAVs

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Index of the communication channel to use

broadcast.title: Broadcast allowed?
broadcast.description: Stores whether the server is allowed to use a broadcast message

ignoreIds.title: Ignore IDs
ignoreIds.description: Whether to broadcast the message to all UAVs, ignoring the explicit UAV IDs in the command

uavIdList.title: UAV IDs
uavIdList.description: IDs of the UAVs that the message refers to

uavStatusInfo.title: UAV status info
uavStatusInfo.description: Status information of a single UAV

mode.title: Flight mode
mode.description: The flight mode of the UAV

heading.title: Heading
heading.description: The heading of the UAV in the local tangent plane, in 1/10th of degrees

timestamp.title: Last updated at
timestamp.description: Timestamp that denotes when the status of the UAV was updated the last time

velocityNED.title: Velocity (NED)
velocityNED.description: Velocity in the NED coordinate system

items.title: North component
items.description: North component of the vector, in mm/s

items.title: East component
items.description: East component of the vector, in mm/s

items.title: Down component
items.description: Down component of the vector, in mm/s

velocityXYZ.title: Velocity (XYZ)
velocityXYZ.description: Velocity in a local right-handed XYZ coordinate system

items.title: X component
items.description: X component of the vector, in mm/s

items.title: Y component
items.description: Y component of the vector, in mm/s

items.title: Z component
items.description: Z component of the vector, in mm/s

versionMap.description: Object mapping string identifiers to version numbers in no particular format

versionNumber.title: Version
versionNumber.description: Version number in major.minor.patch format; minor and patch versions are optional

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp that denotes the time the weather information applies to

code.title: Weather condition code
code.description: Numeric weather condition code according to OpenWeatherMap conventions

sunrise.title: Sunrise
sunrise.description: Time of sunrise; negative if the Sun does not rise on the given day

sunset.title: Sunset
sunset.description: Time of sunset; negative if the Sun does not set on the given day

feelsLike.title: Feels like
feelsLike.description: Temperature, in kelvin, adjusted for human perception of weather

pressure.title: Pressure
pressure.description: Atmospheric pressure on the sea level, in Pa

dewPoint.title: Dew point
dewPoint.description: Atmospheric temperature in 1/10th kelvin below which water droplets begin to condense and dew can form

windDirection.title: Wind direction
windDirection.description: Meteorological wind direction, in 1/10th degrees clockwise from due North

weatherStationIdList.title: Weather station IDs
weatherStationIdList.description: IDs of the weather stations that the message refers to
